text: Naagamba nti abange bantu bange mulaba nti singa mbadde ku bulungamu obwava ewa Mukama omulabirizi wange, nampa ne Riziki ennungi ate nnyinza okubaleka (nessibagambako) ate era saagala kubaawukanako nenzira ku ebyo bye mbagaana sirina kyengenderera kyonna okugyako okulongoosa nga bwemba nsobodde, era okulungama kwange tekuli okugyako ewa Katonda yye gwenneekwasiza era gyali gyengenda okudda
